document.masterDocTitle: Review of Gibberifera Obraztsov (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae) from China, with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of Gibberifera Obraztsov (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae) from China, with description of a new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Penthina simplana Fischer von Röslerstamm, 1836: 38
. TL: Czech Republic (near Reichstadt); TD: unknown.

subSubSection.paragraph:

Host plants.
Populus tremula
,
Salix spp.
( Salicaceae ).
Distribution . China ( Hebei , Shanxi , Heilongjiang , Henan , Zhejiang , Hubei , Hunan , Guangxi , Shaanxi , Gansu , Yunnan , Taiwan) , Korea , Japan , Russia , Europe.

Remarks. This species is the type species of
Gibberifera
, and in the male genitalia uncus is bifurcated deeply and non-deciduous cornuti are absent in vesica.
